goal: tester, please create unit tests for `calculator.py` in `test_calculator.py` and run them to ensure everything works correctly.

rules.name: Initialize Test Environment
rules.condition: Start of unit testing process for `calculator.py`
rules.action: Create a new file `test_calculator.py` and setup the testing environment
rules.expected_outcome: `test_calculator.py` is created with necessary imports and test class structure

rules.name: Write Unit Tests
rules.action: Write unit tests for all functions in `calculator.py`
rules.expected_outcome: All functions in `calculator.py` have corresponding unit tests in `test_calculator.py`

rules.name: 智能体回退策略 - 使用tester
rules.condition: 当前任务执行失败且需要智能体能力时
rules.action: 使用备用智能体tester重新执行原任务

rules.name: Run Unit Tests
rules.action: Execute the unit tests using a test runner
rules.expected_outcome: All unit tests pass, confirming `calculator.py` functions work correctly
